Title: Relates to vehicular assault and vehicular manslaughter
Summary: Establishes the class E felony of vehicular assault in the third degree; redefines the requirements for a violation of vehicular assault in the second degree; expands the offenses of vehicular assault and vehicular manslaughter; and establishes the class D felony of vehicular manslaughter in the third degree.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to vehicular assault and vehicular manslaughter
